org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.layouts.gve

Class GVELayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.layouts.gve.GVELayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphCollectionLayout<GraphHead,Vertex,Edge>, Layout<Vertex,Edge>, LogicalGraphLayout<GraphHead,Vertex,Edge>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexedGVELayout

    public class GVELayout
extends Object
implements LogicalGraphLayout<GraphHead,Vertex,Edge>, GraphCollectionLayout<GraphHead,Vertex,Edge>
    Represents a graph or a graph collection using three separate datasets: - the first dataset contains the graph heads which are the meta data of logical graphs - the second dataset contains the vertices contained in all graphs of the collection - the third dataset contains the edges contained in all graphs of the collection

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<Edge> getEdges()
      Returns all edges.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<Edge> getEdgesByLabel(String label)
      Returns all edges having the specified label.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<GraphHead> getGraphHead()
      Returns a dataset containing a single graph head associated with that logical graph.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<GraphHead> getGraphHeads()
      Returns the graph heads associated with the logical graphs in that collection.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<GraphHead> getGraphHeadsByLabel(String label)
      Returns the graph heads associated with the logical graphs in that collection filtered by label.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<GraphTransaction> getGraphTransactions()
      Returns the graph collection represented as graph transactions.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<Vertex> getVertices()
      Returns all vertices.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<Vertex> getVerticesByLabel(String label)
      Returns all vertices having the specified label.
      boolean isGVELayout()
      True, if the layout is based on three separate datasets.
      boolean isIndexedGVELayout()
      True, if the layout is based on separate datasets separated by graph, vertex and edge labels.
      boolean isTransactionalLayout()
      True, if the layout is based on a transactional data representation.
